content: From the mini-boss lair, you can head past where the toad emerged from to the right to find a path with a green wisp Spirit you can absorb for a decent amount of Will. Past this is a Snake-Head Mushroom, and a ledge that will lead down to a larger central area that the main path also leads to.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Trail' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
From the mini-boss lair, you can head past where the toad emerged from to the right to find a path with a green wisp Spirit you can absorb for a decent amount of Will. Past this is a Snake-Head Mushroom, and a ledge that will lead down to a larger central area that the main path also leads to.
